bot_not_enough_permissions_1: BOT has not enough permissions on this server or channel
bot_not_enough_permissions_2: Write /help (command name), to see the missing permissions
bot_not_enough_permissions_3: And also ask the server administration to give them to the bot
user_not_enough_permissions: You do not have enough permissions on this channel or server
command_only_in_guilds: This command working only on servers
command_only_in_voice: You need to be in voice channel for executing this command
voice_join_in_any_channel: Please, join in any voice channel
